00038 const char *CommandOpen::ms_usage[] = {
00039   "open <fname> flags=[READ|WRITE|LOCK|CREATE|EXCL|TEMP|LOCK_SHARED|LOCK_EXCLUSIVE] [event-mask=<mask>]",
00040   "  This command issues an OPEN request to Hyperspace.  The optional",
00041   "  parameter event-mask may take a value that is the combination of",
00042   "  the following strings:",
00043   "    ATTR_SET|ATTR_DEL|CHILD_NODE_ADDED|CHILD_NODE_REMOVED|LOCK_ACQUIRED|LOCK_RELEASED",
00044   (const char *)0
00045 };
00046 
00047 int CommandOpen::run() {
00048   std::string fname = "";
00049   int flags = 0;
00050   int event_mask = 0;
00051   char *str, *last;
00052   uint64_t handle;
00053   int error;
00054 
00055   for (size_t i=0; i<m_args.size(); i++) {
00056     if (m_args[i].first == "flags") {
00057       str = strtok_r((char *)m_args[i].second.c_str(), " \t|", &last);
00058       while (str) {
00059         if (!strcmp(str, "READ"))
00060           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_READ;
00061         else if (!strcmp(str, "WRITE"))
00062           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_WRITE;
00063         else if (!strcmp(str, "LOCK"))
00064           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00065         else if (!strcmp(str, "CREATE"))
00066           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_CREATE;
00067         else if (!strcmp(str, "EXCL"))
00068           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_EXCL;
00069         else if (!strcmp(str, "TEMP"))
00070           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_TEMP;
00071         else if (!strcmp(str, "LOCK_SHARED"))
00072           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED;
00073         else if (!strcmp(str, "LOCK_EXCLUSIVE"))
00074           flags |= OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE;
00075         str = strtok_r(0, " \t|", &last);
00076       }
00077     }
00078     else if (m_args[i].first == "event-mask") {
00079       str = strtok_r((char *)m_args[i].second.c_str(), " \t|", &last);
00080       while (str) {
00081         if (!strcmp(str, "ATTR_SET"))
00082           event_mask |= EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET;
00083         else if (!strcmp(str, "ATTR_DEL"))
00084           event_mask |= EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL;
00085         else if (!strcmp(str, "CHILD_NODE_ADDED"))
00086           event_mask |= EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED;
00087         else if (!strcmp(str, "CHILD_NODE_REMOVED"))
00088           event_mask |= EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED;
00089         else if (!strcmp(str, "LOCK_ACQUIRED"))
00090           event_mask |= EVENT_MASK_LOCK_ACQUIRED;
00091         else if (!strcmp(str, "LOCK_RELEASED"))
00092           event_mask |= EVENT_MASK_LOCK_RELEASED;
00093         str = strtok_r(0, " \t|", &last);
00094       }
00095     }
00096     else if (fname != "" || m_args[i].second != "") {
00097       cerr << "Invalid arguments.  Type 'help' for usage." << endl;
00098       return -1;
00099     }
00100     else
00101       fname = m_args[i].first;
00102   }
00103 
00104   if (flags == 0) {
00105     cerr << "Error: no flags supplied." << endl;
00106     return -1;
00107   }
00108   else if (fname == "") {
00109     cerr << "Error: no filename supplied." << endl;
00110     return -1;
00111   }
00112 
00113   //HT_INFOF("open(%s, 0x%x, 0x%x)", fname.c_str(), flags, event_mask);
00114 
00115   HandleCallbackPtr callback = new FileHandleCallback(event_mask);
00116 
00117   if ((error = m_session->open(fname, flags, callback, &handle)) == Error::OK) {
00118     std::string normal_name;
00119     Util::normalize_pathname(fname, normal_name);
00120     Global::file_map[normal_name] = handle;
00121   }
00122   return error;
00123 }
